name: asana-gitlab-bridge
description: Opinionated, self-hosted tool that keeps GitLab in sync with Asana
author: Bukwild

scripts.serverless: source .env && cd functions && export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=$AWS_ACCESS_KEY && export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=$AWS_SECRET_KEY && serverless
scripts.contentful:asana:create: source .env && cd extensions/asana-projects && contentful extension create --space-id $CONTENTFUL_SPACE_ID
scripts.contentful:asana:update: source .env && cd extensions/asana-projects && contentful extension update --space-id $CONTENTFUL_SPACE_ID --force
